references.paper_title: PCAM: Product of cross-attention matrices for rigid registration of point clouds
references.reason: This paper pioneered the integration of low-level geometric and high-level contextual information for point cloud registration, inspiring many subsequent works in this field.

references.paper_title: Hregnet: A hierarchical network for large-scale outdoor lidar point cloud registration
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenges of large-scale outdoor LiDAR point cloud registration, a problem directly tackled by the current paper.

references.paper_title: Speal: Skeletal prior embedded attention learning for cross-source point cloud registration
references.reason: This paper, also by authors of the current paper, explores cross-source point cloud registration, providing a related context for the current work's focus on unsupervised registration.

references.paper_title: Geometric transformer for fast and robust point cloud registration
references.reason: This paper proposes a geometric transformer network for efficient point cloud registration, offering a different approach compared to the method proposed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Regformer: an efficient projection-aware transformer network for large-scale point cloud registration
references.reason: This paper presents an efficient transformer-based approach for large-scale point cloud registration, showcasing another relevant method in the field.
